data.comment: 6076 spectators have come along to watch today.
The match is underway. Dinamo Moscow have kicked-off.
Dinamo Moscow takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 4, Tonny Vilhena of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Clinton N'Jie (Dinamo Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Krasnodar are coming forward and Marcus Berg gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for Krasnodar in Moscow.
Kirill Levnikov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Krasnodar drives forward and Tonny Vilhena gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 10, Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 12, Dinamo Moscow's Vyacheslav Grulev is on target but unsuccessful.
Kirill Levnikov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Kirill Levnikov has awarded Krasnodar a corner.
In the minute 15, Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Nikola Moro of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Remy Cabella (Krasnodar) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 20, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Cristian Ramirez for Krasnodar who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Cristian Ramirez, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Kaio Pantaleao is the substitute for Krasnodar.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Free kick Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 24, Dinamo Moscow's Vyacheslav Grulev misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at VTB Arena.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Daniil Lesovoy for Dinamo Moscow is whistled offside.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Krasnodar are pushing forward but Igor Smolnikov's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Krasnodar pushes forward through Aleksandr Martynovich, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 33, Kirill Levnikov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Aleksandr Martynovich is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 35, Aleksandr Martynovich for Krasnodar is back on the field again.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Dinamo Moscow drives forward and Sebastian Szymanski gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 37, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Vyacheslav Grulev.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
Sergey Parshivlyuk (Dinamo Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 42, Krasnodar are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Kirill Levnikov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Viktor Claesson (Krasnodar) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Krasnodar are pushing forward but Kaio Pantaleao's finish is wide of the goal.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Sebastian Szymanski is booked for the home team.
Krasnodar kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 47, Igor Smolnikov (Krasnodar) gets a yellow card.
Kirill Levnikov has awarded Dinamo Moscow a corner.
In the minute 48, Dinamo Moscow's Ivan Ordets attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Kirill Levnikov awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow's Clinton N'Jie misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Krasnodar at VTB Arena.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sebastian Szymanski (Dinamo Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 54, Krasnodar takes a corner from the left.
Krasnodar drive upfield and Tonny Vilhena gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dinamo Moscow defender.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 55, Sergey Parshivlyuk is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The away team replace Daniil Utkin with Shapi Suleymanov.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 57, Dinamo Moscow's Sergey Parshivlyuk is back in action after a slight knock.
Dinamo Moscow take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Daniil Lesovoy.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Yuri Gazinskiy (Krasnodar) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 61, Kirill Levnikov has awarded Krasnodar a corner.
Tonny Vilhena of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
In the minute 62, Clinton N'Jie of Dinamo Moscow is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at VTB Arena.
Dinamo Moscow drive forward but Vyacheslav Grulev is judged offside.
In the minute 63, Kirill Levnikov signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, Kaio Pantaleao (Krasnodar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Krasnodar drive upfield and Shapi Suleymanov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dinamo Moscow defender.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Nikolay Komlichenko is on a sub for Clinton N'Jie for Dinamo Moscow.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Krasnodar takes a corner from the right.
Dinamo Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Kirill Levnikov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Dinamo Moscow's Nikolay Komlichenko is on target but unsuccessful.
Yuri Gazinskiy is booked for the away team.
Daniil Lesovoy (Dinamo Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Krasnodar takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 75, Eduard Spertsyan is replacing Viktor Claesson for the away team.
Krasnodar make their fourth substitution with Maksim Kutovoy replacing Marcus Berg.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
In the minute 76, The away team replace Yuri Gazinskiy with Ruslan Kambolov.
Krasnodar's Tonny Vilhena misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 77, Kirill Levnikov awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Throw-in for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Krasnodar are pushing forward but Tonny Vilhena's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Daniil Fomin of Dinamo Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Sebastian Szymanski of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 84, Krasnodar's Shapi Suleymanov has run offside.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow drive forward but Daniil Lesovoy is judged offside.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Krasnodar.
Dinamo Moscow make their second substitution with Zaurbek Pliev replacing Dmitri Skopintsev.
Anton Terekhov is replacing Vyacheslav Grulev for the home team.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow push upfield and Nikolay Komlichenko gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Krasnodar defence.
In the minute 88, Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Roman Evgeniev (Dinamo Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 89, Dinamo Moscow's Nikola Moro is on target but unsuccessful.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow drives forward and Daniil Lesovoy gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kirill Levnikov has awarded Dinamo Moscow a corner.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Igor Shkolik is on a sub for Sebastian Szymanski for Dinamo Moscow.
